Synopis:

This television series portrays a futuristic 

society where citizens are only allowed to 

live until age 30. Logan is a Sandman 

(police assassin) who is 26 years old; he 

decides to try to escape to freedom and a 

mythical place called 'Sanctuary.' He is 

pursued by his former friend, another 

Sandman, who attempts to terminate him. 


Episode 11: Carousel

Strangers shoot Logan with a dart 

containing a serum that erases his 

memory. Francis then takes him back to 

the City to testify against the Sanctuary 

and to be terminated via Carousel. Jessica 

and Rem try to save Logan and retrieve his 

memory.
